ygData.subject: Re:  Purity belt...SPOILER REQUEST
ygData.msgSnippet: Worse INDEED! Lets say I want to drink a beer.  I can buy it from the NPC or... brew my own for three times as much!  What a wonderful tradeskill. Roop ...
ygData.messageBody:
Worse INDEED!

Lets say I want to drink a beer. I can buy it from the NPC or... brew my own for three times as much! What a wonderful tradeskill.

Roop

-----Original Message-----
From: Steve Quarterman <steveq@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 8:35 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Purity belt...SPOILER REQUEST


At 06:32 PM 7/14/99 -0700, you wrote:


Try "brewing". It's boring but you make really good money!

Brangwen
Little Bard of Kelathin


Not any more 8) They nerfed brewing as bad as they nerfed fletching or maybe even worse

------------------------------------------------------------------------
Albereth - 20th Circle Halfling Druid
Master Brewer
The Arcane Order
Mithaniel Marr Server
